properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands; Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Storm Watch issued January 31 at 8:17PM PST until February 3 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 kt with gusts up to 55 kt and
combined seas 16 to 22 feet possible when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Outer coastal waters from the Central Coast to San
Clemente Island.

* WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Potentially very strong winds may create
exceptionally dangerous sea conditions which could capsize or
damage vessels of all sizes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare to remain in port, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions before conditions
deteriorate.

NWSheadline: STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON
